Posted By: Duskdale_Wurm (6/8/2010 11:54:15 PM)

posts.post_content:
You can never go wrong with this guy. At the least, he is a nuisance that has to be dealt with eventually by removal. At the worst, he is a game winning vehicle when equipped with artifacts, damage boosts and/or enchantments.
  
   
[Quietus Spike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quietus Spike) is devastating.
  
[Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer) will hurt, a lot.
  
   
Umbra's are a great fit, particularly since they help him avoid removal for a brief time.
  
   
4/5
posts.html:
You can never go wrong with this guy. At the least, he is a nuisance that has to be dealt with eventually by removal. At the worst, he is a game winning vehicle when equipped with artifacts, damage boosts and/or enchantments.

Quietus Spike is devastating.
Loxodon Warhammer will hurt, a lot.

Umbra's are a great fit, particularly since they help him avoid removal for a brief time.

4/5

posts.post_content:
3 CMC for 2/2 unblockable is fantastic.  
  
Pump him with the right equipment, and your opponent is forced to deal with him if they can.   
  
The artwork and flavour suits the card perfectly. If you are a blue mage and you need a beatstick, this is your man!
